title: Lucky.Girl.2001.DVDR.ENG.JAP
description:
Hello,

Couldn&#039;t find this movie myself when I was looking for it on the Internet. So I bought it, which wasn&#039;t easy either. Only store I found that had this movie was Amazon.jp

And because I thought it was a good movie and not available everywhere, I want to share it...
I haven&#039;t uploaded anything yet, it&#039;s my first attempt so be patient. :)

Hope you like the movie too!

TiTLE.....[ Lucky Girl,     Also Known As: My Daughter&#039;s Secret Life (USA) 
YEAR......[ 2001
GENRE.....[ Drama
RUNTiME...[ 100 min
RELDATE...[ 2001-04-08 (CANADA)
iMDB RATE.[ 7.2/10
iMDB URL..[ http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0279204/

AUDiO.....[ English 2.0 & Japanese 2.0
ViDEO.....[ DVD
SUBS......[ Custom English & Japanese

CAST:
Elisha Cuthbert,
Sherry Miller,
Evan Sabba.

Standard language is set to Japanese., but easily changeable.

To bad the Menu is in Japanese so here are some quick translations:

1st:   PLAY MOVIE
2nd: CHAPTER LIST
3rd:  AUDIO & SUBTITLES
4th:  ENGLISH TRAILER
4th:  JAPANESE TRAILER
5th:  PHOTO GALLERY

AUDIO  MENU:
1st:   ENGLISH 2.0
2nd: JAPANESE 2.0

SUBITLES
1st:   JAPANESE
2nd: ENGLISH
3rd:  NONE

Ripped it to Region &#039;all&#039;.

Hope this is enough info. Can&#039;t read the DVD box because it&#039;s all in Japanese. ;)

Can&#039;t put my uploads at highest all of the time!
Please be patient with downloading, it&#039;s really worth it!
